text: Lucjan Sosnowski (6 January 1934 - 4 September 1999) was a Polish wrestler. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Polish male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Poland Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:People from Lublin County Category:People from Lublin Voivodeship (1919–1939) Category:Sportspeople from Lublin Voivodeship
title: Lucjan Sosnowski
